formalText: She has a track meet coming up also that she's training for because she is a runner.
She is at the top of her class.
She wants to see what the scale says.
She is eating and tells her mom what she eats just because she's not fat like her mom is.
She is busy and not concerned about happiness.
She needs to train and she is tired of everyone asking her about what she eats and how much she exercises. She's the smartest in her class and one of the best Runners on the team.
She doesn't have time for all this.
She's only here to keep her mom off her back.
She knows she doesn't want to be like this.
She does want to be better.
